pageContext.public_note: Summer camps will be online with Lakewood Rec. by early May! Registration opens May 24!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Let your imagination run wild with tens of thousands of LEGOÂ® parts! pageContext.action_url_comment: Summer 2019 camp registration begins May 24th for residents!
